name: The Princess Adventure
descr:
[img]https://cdn.cloudflare.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/850740/extras/b001_eng.png?t=1554494424[/img]
In The Princess Adventure, you must find the Prince of another kingdom that has been kidnapped, and thus prevent the peace agreement they have signed to be broken, and their people end up suffering again with the war. But for this you have to will play with the most unlikely character, the Princess, who will have to pass through dangerous regions between the kingdoms behind the evil Witch who wants to fulfill her revenge against the Prince.

[img]https://cdn.cloudflare.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/850740/extras/b003_eng.png?t=1554494424[/img]
The Princess Adventure is a 2D platform game, inspired by classics like MegaMan, Contra and others. Where gameplay focuses on the player's ability to get through challenges that will test their accuracy in jumps and time, where any wrong step can cause them death. Several enemies and traps are strategically placed on the maps to not give you time to think, and your movements should be careful.

[img]https://cdn.cloudflare.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/850740/extras/b002_eng.png?t=1554494424[/img]
[list][li]2D platform game, retro style
[/li][li]Explore a world crafted in an incredible pixel art
[/li][li]Original soundtrack
[/li][li]Several maps with challenges that gradually increase your difficulty
[/li][li]Ruthless enemies[/li][/list]
